descriptions.we_appreciate: We appreciate your continued trust in VitalOp.
descriptions.check_email: Please, check your email and confirm your new email before changing the password.

hints.push_notifications: These notifications are vital in your journey to better heath.
hints.MWJTasks: Make sure you stay connected to your Wellness Journey. This is vital to reverse and prevent chronic disease.
hints.news: Stay connected with VItalOP and the most up to date health information. You do not want to miss out!
hints.medications: Use this reminder to help you remember to take your medications.
hints.doctorAppointments: Use this reminder to help you remember your upcoming doctors appointments.
hints.screeningTests: Use this reminder to help you remember your upcoming procedures.
hints.eyeExam: Use this reminder to help you remember your upcoming eye exam.
hints.scheduleAppointments: Use this reminder to help you remember your upcoming appointments.
hints.vitalChecks: Use this reminder to help you remember to check your blood pressure or blood sugars regularly.
hints.water: Use this reminder to help you remember to drink water on a regular basis.
